definition: A formal declaration or communication expressing the refusal, rejection, or cancellation of an invitation, offer, appointment, or event. It is commonly used in professional or formal contexts to convey the act of declining or turning down something.

examples.german: Die Absage der Veranstaltung war eine große Enttäuschung.
examples.english: The cancellation of the event was a big disappointment.

examples.german: Ich habe eine Absage auf meine Bewerbung erhalten.
examples.english: I received a rejection for my application.

examples.german: Leider muss ich Ihnen eine Absage erteilen.
examples.english: Unfortunately, I have to give you a refusal.

examples.german: Die Absage des Projekts kam überraschend.
examples.english: The cancellation of the project came as a surprise.

examples.german: Er erhielt eine Absage von seinem Traumjob.
examples.english: He received a rejection from his dream job.
